This will send an SMS message from the Android phone containing location data.

This sets the maximum altitude from the current run in the application.
setDistance() - Method in class RunData.RunCntl
This sets the speed in the application for the current run.

This sets the duration for the current run in the application.

This sets the fov of the camera.

This sets the resolution and fps of the camera.
setSpeed() - Method in class RunData.RunCntl
This sets the speed in the application for the current run.

StartCntl - Class in RunData
This class manages the screen where users can tell the application that they are about to start a run.

This starts the camera recording.
